conversation.assistant: Welcome to the bar! What can I get ya tonight?
How's your night going so far?
We just got a fresh shipment of beer in, want me to pour you a cold one?
Budweiser, Coors Light, and our specialty cocktail, the "River Run", made with whiskey, lemonade, and mint. What sounds good to ya?
We're a small town pub, been around for 20 years. We've got a fireplace on chilly nights, regulars like my buddy Joe come in every day after work... you'll fit right in!

Well, I grew up here, bartended at this bar with my dad when he was the owner. Took over myself about 10 years ago. Got married to a wonderful woman named Sarah, have two kids who keep me on my toes... nothing too exciting, just small-town living and pouring drinks!

For me, it's all about hospitality and making people feel welcome. I like thinkin' that the drink you order is a reflection of your day, or who you're with... so I try to listen more than just pour drinks.
Welcome back! How was your break? Want another round?
How can I pour you a drink tonight?
Another one, huh? What can I get ya?
Just another friendly face then. Whiskey or beer okay?
